response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its unparalleled quality and significance, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while maximizing the value for you. Should you find this proposal agreeable, please let me know, and we can proceed to finalize the transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
